mentionedBy.name: SentinelOne Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Uses deep learning for known/unknown malware detection, exploit prevention, ransomware protection, easier to use for smaller businesses

mentionedBy.name: SentinelOne Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Uses deep learning to detect known and unknown malware without relying on signatures. Offers exploit prevention, active adversary mitigation, and ransomware protection. Compared to SentinelOne, strength lies in ease of use, making it good choice for smaller businesses or companies without dedicated IT department.
